title: The Recipe Alice Waters Can't Live Without | Niloufer Ichaporia King
description:
Referenced in this episode:

  • The One Recipe Alice Waters Can't Live Without
  • Cardamom Cake from Niloufer Ichaporia King

Genius-Hunter Extra Credit:

  • Alice Waters names Niloufer's cake the one recipe she can't live without (The Guardian)
  • Check out those not-dry turkey burgers

Special thanks to listeners Numra (@empressmarket), Vlada (@mat.vlada), and Nilufar (@kayhanikitchen) for sharing your favorite cardamom-centric recipes!

Is there a recipe that's stayed with you throughout your life? Tell me all about it at genius@food52.com.
author: podcasts@food52.com (Niloufer Ichaporia King, Kristen Miglore)

itunes:title: The Recipe Alice Waters Can't Live Without | Niloufer Ichaporia King
itunes:author: Niloufer Ichaporia King, Kristen Miglore
itunes:summary:
Cookbook author Niloufer Ichaporia King tells Kristen about the beguiling, modular cardamom cake she encountered at backyard wedding 40 years ago and has since modified into the one recipe Alice Waters says she can't live without.
This episode originally aired 4/21/21
